atk-abh03a32:2_1: Idāni atthi arahato puññūpacayotikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:2_2: Tattha yesaṁ arahato dānasaṁvibhāgacetiyavandanādīni kammāni disvā atthi arahato puññūpacayoti laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:2_11: Dānaṁ dadeyyātiādīsu kiriyacittena dānādipavattisabbhāvato sakavādī paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:2_12: Itaro cittaṁ anādiyitvā kiriyāpavattimattadassaneneva laddhiṁ patiṭṭhapeti.
atk-abh03a32:2_13: Sā pana ayoniso patiṭṭhāpitattā appatiṭṭhāpitā hotīti.
atk-abh03a32:5_1: Idāni natthi arahato akālamaccūtikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:5_4: sañcetanikānaṁ kammānaṁ katānaṁ upacitānaṁ apaṭisaṁveditvā byantībhāvaṁ vadāmī”ti suttassa atthaṁ ayoniso
atk-abh03a32:5_12: arahantaghātakena nāma na bhavitabba”nti codetuṁ natthi arahantaghātakoti āha.
atk-abh03a32:5_13: Itaro ānantariyakammassa ceva tādisānañca puggalānaṁ sabbhāvato paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a32:6_0: 781.Visaṁ na kameyyāti pañhe “yāva pubbe katakammaṁ parikkhayaṁ na gacchati,
atk-abh03a32:7_1: sañcetanikānaṁ kammānaṁ katānaṁ vipākaṁ apaṭisaṁveditvā avinditvā ananubhavitvā byantībhāvaṁ tesaṁ kammānaṁ parivaṭumaparicchinnabhāvaṁ na vadāmi,
atk-abh03a32:7_4: upapajjavedanīyānaṁ anantaraṁ upapattiṁ upapajjitvāva na tato paraṁ,
atk-abh03a32:7_7: Evaṁ sabbathāpi saṁsārapavatte sati laddhavipākavāre kamme na vijjateso jagatippadeso,
atk-abh03a32:7_9: Evaṁ sante yadetaṁ “aladdhavipākavārampi kammaṁ avassaṁ arahato paṭisaṁveditabba”nti kappanāvasena “natthi
atk-abh03a32:10_2: Tattha “kammunā vattati loko”ti suttaṁ nissāya “sabbamidaṁ kammakilesavipākavaṭṭaṁ kammatova hotī”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:10_6: Atha naṁ “evaṁ sante kammampi kammato āpajjatī”ti codetuṁ kammampi kammatoti āha.
atk-abh03a32:10_7: Itaro yadi kammampi kammatova nāma taṁ kammaṁ vipākoyeva siyāti paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a32:11_2: tampi purimatare bhave kammatoti kammavipāko sampajjati,
atk-abh03a32:11_3: tena te sabbamidaṁ kammavipākato āpajjatī”ti codetuṁ pucchati.
atk-abh03a32:11_4: Itaro bījato aṁkurasseva paccuppannapavattassa kammato nibbattiṁ sandhāya paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a32:11_5: Dutiyaṁ puṭṭho tassāpi kammassa bījassa purimabījato viya purimakammato pavattattā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:11_8: Itaro dussīlyacetanāpi purimakammanibbattā ekena pariyāyena vipākoyevāti laddhiyā paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:11_9: Atha naṁ “yadi te pāṇātipāto kammavipākato nibbattati,
atk-abh03a32:11_10: pāṇātipāto viya vipākopi saphalo āpajjatī”ti codetuṁ saphaloti āha.
atk-abh03a32:11_11: Itaro pāṇātipātassa nirayasaṁvattanikādibhāvato saphalataṁ passanto paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:11_12: Kammavipākassa pana idaṁ nāma phalanti vuttaṭṭhānaṁ apassanto paṭikkhipati.
atk-abh03a32:11_15: Kammunā vattatīti suttaṁ “natthi kamma”nti akammavāditaṁ paṭikkhipitvā “atthi kamma”nti kammavāditaṁ kammassakataṁ dīpeti.
atk-abh03a32:14_6: anindriyabaddhaṁ udayabbayapaṭipīḷanaṭṭhena “yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti saṅgahitattā dukkhaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:14_7: Imaṁ vibhāgaṁ aggahetvā “yassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati,
atk-abh03a32:14_11: tesaṁ itarassāpi dukkhabhāvaṁ dassetuṁ indriyabaddhaññevāti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a32:14_13: Atha naṁ “yasmā bhagavatā ‘yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha’nti vuttaṁ,
atk-abh03a32:14_14: tasmā indriyabaddheneva tena aniccena bhavitabba”nti codetuṁ indriyabaddhaññeva aniccantiādimāha.
atk-abh03a32:14_15: Nanuanindriyabaddhaṁ aniccanti nanu pathavīpabbatapāsāṇādi anindriyabaddhampi aniccanti attho.
atk-abh03a32:15_0: 788.Na vattabbaṁ indriyabaddhaññeva dukkhanti pañhe āmantāti paṭiññā sakavādissa.
atk-abh03a32:15_2: Uṇhakālasmiñhi aggi sītakāle ca vāto dukkhassa ārammaṇaṁ,
atk-abh03a32:15_4: Tasmā vināpi aniccaṭṭhena anindriyabaddhaṁ dukkhanti vattabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:15_5: Kammakilesehi pana anibbattattā dukkhaṁ ariyasaccanti na vattabbaṁ,
atk-abh03a32:15_7: Yasmā pana tiṇakaṭṭhādinirodho vā utubījādinirodho vā dukkhanirodhaṁ ariyasaccaṁ nāma na hoti,
atk-abh03a32:15_9: itaraṁ pana dukkhamevāti idaṁ nānattaṁ dassetuṁ paṭijānāti.
atk-abh03a32:15_10: Yathā indriyabaddhassātiādivacanaṁ indriyabaddhassa pariññāya brahmacariyavāsaṁ pariññātassa puna anuppattiṁ dīpeti.
atk-abh03a32:15_12: “Yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkha”nti vacanena pana saṅgahitassa anindriyabaddhassa dukkhabhāvaṁ paṭisedhetuṁ na sakkāti,
atk-abh03a32:18_3: tasmā ṭhapetvā ariyamaggaṁ avasesā saṅkhārā dukkhā”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:18_7: Atha naṁ “yadi evaṁ samudayassāpi dukkhabhāvo āpajjatī”ti codetuṁ dukkhasamudayopīti āha.
atk-abh03a32:21_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggaṇhātītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:21_5: tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ paṭiggaṇhātī”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:21_7: te sandhāya na vattabbanti pucchā sakavādissa,
atk-abh03a32:21_10: na naṁ satthā āhuneyyātiādīhi thomeyyā”ti codetuṁ nanu saṅgho āhuneyyotiādimāha.
atk-abh03a32:21_11: Saṅghassa dānaṁ dentīti “ye te saṅghassa denti,
atk-abh03a32:21_12: te paṭiggāhakesu asati kassa dadeyyu”nti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:21_13: Āhutiṁ jātavedo vāti suttaṁ parasamayato āgataṁ.
atk-abh03a32:21_19: Maggaphalapātubhāvaparisuddhe pana khandhe upādāya paññattā aṭṭha puggalā saṅgho,
atk-abh03a32:24_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:24_3: na ca tāni dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetuṁ sakkonti,
atk-abh03a32:24_4: tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetī”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:24_8: Āhuneyyotiādi “yadi saṅgho dakkhiṇaṁ visodhetuṁ na sakkuṇeyya,
atk-abh03a32:24_9: na naṁ satthā evaṁ thomeyyā”ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:24_16: appamattikāyapi dakkhiṇāya mahantaṁ phalaṁ pāpuṇantīti attho.
atk-abh03a32:27_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅgho bhuñjatītikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:27_4: tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅgho bhuñjati, pivati, khādati,
atk-abh03a32:27_10: saṅghabhattādikaraṇaṁ niratthakaṁ bhaveyyā”ti codetuṁ nanu atthi keci saṅghabhattāni karontītiādimāha.
atk-abh03a32:27_13: Aṭṭha pānānīti idampi “yadi saṅgho na piveyya,
atk-abh03a32:27_14: kassetāni pānāni satthā anujāneyyā”ti codanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:30_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:30_3: na ca sakkā tesaṁ kiñci dātuṁ,
atk-abh03a32:30_5: nāpi tesaṁ dānena koci upakāro ijjhati,
atk-abh03a32:30_6: tasmā na vattabbaṁ saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphala”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:30_10: Āhuneyyotiādi “yadi saṅghassa dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ na bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a32:30_11: na naṁ satthā evaṁ thomeyyā”ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:33_1: Idāni na vattabbaṁ buddhassa dinnaṁ mahapphalantikathā nāma hoti.
atk-abh03a32:33_3: lokānuvattanatthaṁ pana paribhuñjamānaṁ viya attānaṁ dasseti,
atk-abh03a32:33_4: tasmā nirupakārattā na vattabbaṁ tasmiṁ dinnaṁ mahapphala”nti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:33_9: kimaṅgaṁ pana evarūpe aggapuggale”ti dassanatthaṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a32:36_5: paṭiggāhakena vipāko nibbattitoti añño aññassa kārako bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a32:36_11: dāyakasseva cittavisuddhi vipākadāyikā hotī”ti yesaṁ laddhi,
atk-abh03a32:36_17: Añño aññassa kārakoti yadi dāyakassa dānacetanā paṭiggāhakena katā bhaveyya,
atk-abh03a32:36_19: Tassa pana dānacetanā parisuddhā paṭiggāhakasaṅkhātaṁ vatthuṁ paṭicca mahāvipākaṭṭhena visujjhati,
